civilopediaText.text: Aggressive
Civilizations led by an Aggressive leader get a free Combat I promotion for all melee and gunpowder units. In addition, they get a production bonus of +100% for Barracks and Drydocks.
Creative
Creative leaders get +2 culture per city as well as double production speed for the Theatre, Library, and Colosseum.
Expansive
Expansive leaders get +2 Health per city and double production speed for the Granary and Harbor. As of Beyond the Sword, they also get 25% faster production of Workers.
Financial
Financial leaders get +1 Coin on tiles with at least 2 Coin and double production speed of Banks.
Industrious
Industrious leaders receive a 50% bonus to Wonder production and double production speed for Forges.
Organized
Organized leaders' civic upkeep is reduced by 50 percent. They also get double production speed for the Lighthouse, Courthouse, and the Factory.
Philosophical
Philosophical leader Great People emergence rate is increased by 100 percent. They also get double production speed for the University.
Spiritual
Spiritual leaders have no Anarchy when changing a civic. They also get double production speed for the Temple and the Cristo Redentor wonder.
Charismatic
Charismatic leaders get +1 happiness per city, +1 happiness from Monuments and Broadcast Towers and -25% experience points needed for unit promotions.
Imperialistic
The Imperialistic leaders get a +100% Great General emergence and a 50% faster production of Settlers.
Protective
With Protective leaders the Archery and Gunpowder Units receive Drill I and City Garrison I automatically. Protective leaders also get double production speeds for the Walls and Castle.
